title: Don’t Ask Dumb Robots If AI Will Destroy Humanity
description: Robots like Sophia are impressive to look at, but don’t let their humanlike facial expressions trick you into thinking these machines are intelligent.

title: A Battlefield AI Company Says It’s One of the Good Guys
description: Helsing AI is building an operating system for warfare and says it’ll only ever sell to democracies.

title: Spain’s Elections Pit Gig Workers Against the Far Right
description: A coalition including the right-wing Vox party wants to dismantle protections for workers on Glovo and Uber Eats. If they’re elected, they could change the gig economy across Europe.
